welcome.title: Welcome To Artfinity
welcome.subTitle: Explore a World of Creativity
welcome.content: Welcome to Artfinity — where local creativity meets global reach. We connect art lovers with talented artists through high-quality, made-to-order prints. Artists upload their work directly, earn a 50/50 profit share, showcasing pieces with QR codes beside the original — making it easy to scan and order instantly. Browse by city to explore your local scene or discover emerging talent worldwide. Whether you’re a collector or a first-time buyer, Artfinity makes it simple to support artists and bring their vision into your home.

gallery.title: ARTISTIC SHOWCASE
gallery.content: Discover stunning artworks from talented artists around the world.

products.title: Popular Artworks
products.description: Explore the latest trending artworks on our platform. From contemporary masterpieces to timeless classics, discover what's capturing the attention of art enthusiasts.

sellers.title: Featured Artists
sellers.subTitle: Discover the Talent
sellers.description: Meet the talented artists behind the captivating artworks on Artfinity. From emerging talents to seasoned professionals, explore a diverse range of artistic styles and expressions.

scenes.title: City Art Scenes
scenes.description: Explore diverse art scenes from around the world. From bustling cityscapes to serene landscapes, discover the inspiration behind the art.

reviews.title: Customer Product Reviews
reviews.subTitle: What Our Customers Say
reviews.description: Discover what our satisfied customers have to say about their experience with Artfinity. Read through their feedback and see why we are a trusted platform for art lovers.

about_us.title: About Us
about_us.content:
Welcome to Artfinity — a platform where local creativity meets global reach. We connect art lovers with talented artists by making it simple to discover, purchase, and enjoy beautiful artworks as high-quality prints.

Artfinity was founded with a clear vision: to make local art accessible to everyone, everywhere. Each artwork on our site is uploaded directly by the artist and available as a made-to-order print in multiple sizes. This ensures quality, affordability, and a fair 50/50 profit share between artist and platform.

Beyond the online gallery, Artfinity lives in the real world. Many artists showcase their work with QR codes beside the original piece — allowing you to scan, explore the story behind the art, and order a print instantly.

You can browse by city to explore your local art scene or discover emerging talent from across the world. Our mission is to support artists by giving them visibility and fair earnings, while giving buyers an easy and inspiring way to bring art into their lives.

Whether you’re a collector, a first-time buyer, or simply someone who appreciates creativity, Artfinity makes it simple to connect with artists and bring their vision into your home.

Thank you for supporting independent artists and being part of the Artfinity community.

team_members.title: Meet Our Team
team_members.description: Our team is composed of dedicated professionals who are passionate about art and committed to making Artfinity a leading platform for art enthusiasts and collectors.

team_leader.title: Our Leadership
team_leader.subTitle: WHAT'S ON
team_leader.name: Craig Morley
team_leader.description: Craig Morley, born in England and now residing in Seattle, brings a wealth of experience and passion to Artfinity. His leadership and vision are pivotal in driving the mission and success of our platform. With a strong background in the arts and a commitment to fostering creativity, Craig is dedicated to supporting artists and connecting them with a global audience.

map.title: Get In Touch
map.content: To learn more about our services and how we can help you with your digital art needs. We look forward to hearing from you.

terms_and_conditions.title: Terms and Conditions
terms_and_conditions.subTitle: WEBSITE / ONLINE SALES TERMS & CONDITIONS
terms_and_conditions.content:
Introduction

These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of the Artfinity website (www.theartfinity.com) and the purchase of products or services from us. By using this website or placing an order, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, you must not use this website or purchase from us. You must be at least 18 years old, or the legal age to form a binding contract in your jurisdiction, to use this website.


Use of Website

You may access and use this website for lawful purposes only. All content on this site, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of Artfinity or our artists and may not be copied, reproduced, distributed, or used without permission.


Pricing and Payment

All prices are listed in U.S. dollars and are subject to change without notice. The price charged will be the price at the time your order is placed. Prices do not include applicable taxes or shipping charges, which will be added at checkout. We accept major credit cards through our secure payment provider (Stripe). You represent that the payment information you provide is accurate and that you are authorized to use the chosen payment method.


Shipping and Delivery

All products are produced on demand and shipped to the address provided at checkout. Delivery times are estimates only and may vary. Title and risk of loss pass to you once we transfer the product to the carrier. We are not responsible for delays caused by carriers or events outside our control.


Returns and Refunds

Because all prints are produced on demand, we do not accept returns or exchanges for change of mind or incorrect size selection. If your order arrives damaged, misprinted, or incorrect, you must contact us at support@theartfinity.com within 14 days of delivery with your order number and a photo of the issue. We will provide a replacement at no cost to you or a refund to your original payment method. Shipping costs are non-refundable except where the error was ours. See our Return Policy for full details.


Intellectual Property

All artworks displayed on Artfinity remain the intellectual property of their respective artists. You receive no ownership or reproduction rights by purchasing a print. Reproducing, reselling, or distributing artwork without permission is strictly prohibited.


Disclaimer and Limitation of Liability

We make reasonable efforts to ensure accuracy of product information but do not warrant that the site will be error-free or uninterrupted. To the fullest extent permitted by law, Artfinity disclaims all warranties, express or implied. Our liability shall not exceed the total amount you paid for the product in question. We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.


Governing Law

These Terms are governed by the laws of the United States and the State of New York, without regard to conflict of law principles.


Dispute Resolution

Any dispute arising under these Terms shall be resolved through binding arbitration under the rules of the American Arbitration Association. By using this site, you waive any right to a jury trial or to participate in a class action. Arbitration will take place in New York, New York.


Changes to Terms

We may update these Terms from time to time. Changes will be effective when posted on this page. Continued use of the site after updates constitutes acceptance of the revised Terms.

cookie_policy.title: Cookie Policy
cookie_policy.content:
What Are Cookies?

Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites function properly, improve performance, and provide information to site owners.


How We Use Cookies

We use cookies to:

  • Ensure the website works correctly (essential cookies).
  • Understand and improve site performance (analytics).
  • Remember your preferences (functionality).
  • Show you relevant content and ads (targeting/advertising).

Managing Cookies

By using this website, you consent to our use of cookies unless you disable them. You can control cookies through your browser settings:

  • Chrome
  • Safari
  • Firefox

Note: Blocking cookies may affect site functionality.


Updates

We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page.

cookie_banner.title: Cookie Policy
cookie_banner.content: This site uses cookies to improve your experience. By clicking Accept, you consent to cookies. Learn more.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.content:
Introduction

This Privacy Policy explains how Artfinity collects, uses, and protects your personal information. By using our website, you consent to the practices described here.


Information We Collect

We may collect:

  • Personal details such as your name, email address, billing and shipping information when you register, make a purchase, or contact us.
  • Payment information processed securely by third-party providers (Stripe); we do not store your credit card details.
  • Images and media you upload, which are hosted with third-party providers (Cloudinary).
  • Technical data such as IP address, browser type, device, and operating system.
  • Cookies and similar technologies (see our Cookie Policy).

How We Use Your Information

We use your information to:

  • Process orders, payments, and deliveries.
  • Provide customer support.
  • Improve site functionality and user experience.
  • Send service updates or promotional messages (if you have opted in).
  • Comply with legal and regulatory requirements.

Information Sharing and Disclosure

We do not sell your personal information. We may share limited data with trusted service providers (such as Stripe for payments and Cloudinary for media hosting) solely to operate our services. These providers are required to safeguard your information.


Your Rights

You may request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data by contacting us at support@theartfinity.com. You may also opt out of promotional emails by using the unsubscribe link provided in those messages.


Security

We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information. However, no online transmission or storage method is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.


Governing Law

This Privacy Policy is governed by the laws of the United States and the State of New York.


Changes to Our Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

return_policy.title: Return Policy
return_policy.content:
Returns

Each Artfinity print is produced on demand, especially for you. For this reason, we cannot accept returns or exchanges for change of mind or incorrect size selection. However, if your order arrives damaged, misprinted, or incorrect, we will make it right.


Refunds & Replacements

If your item is damaged, misprinted, or incorrect, please contact us at support@theartfinity.com within 14 days of delivery. Include your order number and a photo of the issue. Once reviewed, we will either send you a replacement at no extra cost or issue a refund to your original payment method.


Shipping Costs

Shipping costs are non-refundable, except in cases where the error was ours (damaged, defective, or incorrect items).


Contact Us

If you have any questions about returns or refunds, please contact us at support@theartfinity.com.
